data.title: CDFA’s CalCannabis Appellations Program Survey
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: CalCannabis Cultivation Licensing, a division of the California Department of Food and Agriculture (CDFA), is preparing to host public workshops this September to provide information and gather feedback from workshop participants on the development of the new CalCannabis Appellations Program. CalCannabis is responsible for developing a process for licensed cannabis cultivators in California to establish […]
